item.title: These major issues have brought together Democrats and Republicans in states
item.description: Across the country, Republicans and Democrats have found bipartisan agreement on regulating artificial intelligence and data centers. But it's not just big tech aligning the two parties.

item.title: Why farmers in California are backing a giant solar farm
item.description: Many farmers have had to fallow land as a state law comes into effect limiting their access to water. There's now a push to develop some of that land … into solar farms.

item.title: Under new regulation, common pesticide would require 'prescription' for use
item.description: Neonicotinoids are widely used pesticides, but they kill bees and harm ecosystems. New rules would treat them more like controlled drugs, requiring something akin to a prescription for their use.

item.title: What we know about the massive sewage leak in the Potomac River
item.description: A collapsed sewer line, about 8 miles from the White House, pumped 368 Olympic-sized swimming pools worth of wastewater into the Potomac. Repairs could take longer than previously expected.
